Not playing anything

Rob Hough 👋 - I’m a product designer and coder based in Britain. Right now, I’m Head of Design for Lantum, designing experiences for healthcare clinicians and managers. Previously I ran design at nuom, a boutique studio working in healthcare, Pharma, and life science.

I also like to ride motorcycles in the countryside, go hiking, and hang out in the city of Nottingham with my wife, Harriet
